PERENGO.TITLE: Perengo
PERENGO.DESCRIPTION: Perengo is a workforce recruitment platform  which focuses on the blue-collar and on-demand sector. Merciba collaborated closely with the product owner / CEO and a team of contractors, leading the UX / UI and front-end development teams. We collaborated on user flows and wireframes, created comps and UI kits, developed core front-end and back-end functionality, and resolved bugs.

SWEET_UNITY.TITLE: Sweet Unity Farms
SWEET_UNITY.DESCRIPTION: We worked with Sweet Unity Farms Coffee to develop an e-commerce site and an online presence. Sweet Unity is a farm-sourced coffee company founded by David Robinson, son of Jackie Robinson. Merciba created their visual identity for their digital content and worked closely with the family to visually express their family and brand values.

SOFTWARE.TITLE: Open-Source Software
SOFTWARE.DESCRIPTION: We are active in the Open-Source Software (OSS) community, and have a passion for developing useful software. We are always 'dogfooding' (using our own software) for projects, hosted on Github, and have published modules on npm (Node Package Manager).

CARD_1.TITLE: Paquet
CARD_1.DESCRIPTION: Paquet is a REST API (meta-)framework with a specific mission: To get a server set up as quickly and effortlessly as possible, with a full suite of production-ready features.

CARD_2.TITLE: K-Nearest
CARD_2.DESCRIPTION: A JavaScript implementation of the K-Nearest-Neighbor machine-learning algorithm.

CARD_3.TITLE: ASCII-Mirror
CARD_3.DESCRIPTION: A Raspberry Pi daemon written in Node.js that generates an ASCII representation of a camera's video feed, thus creating a "mirror" effect in ASCII text.

CARD_4.TITLE: Orequire
CARD_4.DESCRIPTION: A tiny little Node.js module that converts all exported files within a given directory into an object structure. Handy for app bootstrapping.

PAGE_1.TITLE: We believe in balance of the empathetic and the analytical.
PAGE_1.DESCRIPTION:
Merciba is a fully equipped boutique digital agency. We’re fresh on the scene and stay on the cutting edge of design trends and tech.

We work closely with our clients and partners to understand their story and audience. We believe in combining empathy with well-documented research and data. For us, efficiency and measurable results are key. We help our clients identify redundancies, automate, and organize to mitigate technical debt, identify brand inconsistency and spot missed marketing opportunities.

CARD_1.TITLE: Iterative
CARD_1.DESCRIPTION: We make sure to have recurring check-ins with all team members and stakeholders. By continuously validating requirements and deliverables and making changes where needed, we help our clients and partners achieve their goals and meet requirements.

CARD_2.TITLE: Collaborative
CARD_2.DESCRIPTION: Highly functional collaboration between management, design and engineering is key to a successful project. We have worked hard to develop internal workflows to improve communication and collaboration using the industry’s best tools.

CARD_3.TITLE: Flexible
CARD_3.DESCRIPTION: We provide you with options in how to work with us. There are inevitably changes and surprises when it comes to projects; our organizational set up allows for flexibility throughout the project.

PAGE_3.TITLE: About Us
PAGE_3.DESCRIPTION:
First, we’re sure you’re wondering about the name.

It’s pronounced mer-SEE-ba - a mash-up of the word 'thank you' in the languages of our two founders: merci in French and спасибо (spelled phonetically in Latin letters: spasiba) in Russian.

Merciba was founded by Alfonso Gober (a web and microservices developer) and Sofia Falcon (a UI/UX/print designer) in 2015. Together we have over a decade of experience in the technology industry.

We are based out of Brooklyn, NY, but our clients are all over the world. We came together to harmonize our individual skillsets into a one-stop-shop for the clients and partners we want to work with.

Merciba has a special interest in working with marginalized and under-served communities and the organizations that serve them. In this spirit, we offer sliding-scale pricing. We have experience partnering with non-profits, start-ups, small businesses, and individual artists and entrepreneurs.

CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Interested in working with us or just want to say hi? Get in touch. We are currently taking consultation work and are always interested in connecting with like-minded creatives, designers, developers, managers, entrepreneurs and influencers.
